price: 22. Hubaal kani waa abaalgud aad leedihiin, dadaalkiinniina waa la idiin gudi  oo ajar weyn la idinka siin.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā kāna lakum jazāan wakāna saʿyukum mashkūran
